verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of David.) <S%H2502>Rescue<s%> me, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> from <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H376>men;<s%> <S%H5341>Preserve<s%> me from <S%H2555>violent<s%> <S%H120>men,<s%>
They <S%H8150>sharpen<s%> their <S%H3956>tongues<s%> as a <S%H5175>serpent;<s%> <S%H2534>Poison<s%> of a <S%H5919>viper<s%> is <S%H8478>under<s%> their <S%H8193>lips.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

<S%H8104>Keep<s%> me, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> from the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked;<s%> <S%H5341>Preserve<s%> me from <S%H2555>violent<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> <S%H834>Who<s%> have <S%H2803>purposed<s%> to <S%H1760>trip<s%> up my <S%H6471>feet.<s%>

The <S%H1343>proud<s%> have <S%H2934>hidden<s%> a <S%H6341>trap<s%> for me, and <S%H9112>cords;<s%> They have <S%H6566>spread<s%> a <S%H7568>net<s%> by the <S%H4570>wayside;<s%> They have <S%H7896>set<s%> <S%H4170>snares<s%> for me. <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
I <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "Thou art my <S%H410>God;<s%> <S%H238>Give<s%> <S%H238>ear,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H8469>supplications.<s%>
"O <S%H3068>God<s%> the <S%H136>Lord,<s%> the <S%H5797>strength<s%> of my <S%H3444>salvation,<s%> Thou hast <S%H5526>covered<s%> my <S%H7218>head<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5402>battle.<s%>

"Do not <S%H5414>grant,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H3970>desires<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked;<s%> Do not <S%H6329>promote<s%> his [evil] <S%H2162>device,<s%> [lest] they be <S%H7311>exalted.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
"As for the <S%H7218>head<s%> of those who <S%H5437>surround<s%> me, May the <S%H5999>mischief<s%> of their <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H3680>cover<s%> them.

"May <S%H784>burning<s%> <S%H1513>coals<s%> <S%H4131>fall<s%> upon them; May they be <S%H5307>cast<s%> into the <S%H784>fire,<s%> Into <S%H4113>deep<s%> <S%H4113>pits<s%> from which they <S%H1077>cannot<s%> <S%H6965>rise.<s%>

"May a <S%H376>slanderer<s%> <S%H3956><s%> not be <S%H3559>established<s%> in the <S%H776>earth;<s%> May <S%H9563>evil<s%> <S%H6679>hunt<s%> the <S%H2555>violent<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4073>speedily.<s%>"
I <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H6213>maintain<s%> the <S%H1779>cause<s%> of the <S%H6031>afflicted,<s%> And <S%H4941>justice<s%> for the <S%H34>poor.<s%>
<S%H389>Surely<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> will <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to Thy <S%H8034>name;<s%> The <S%H3477>upright<s%> will <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in Thy <S%H6440>presence.<s%>
